metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3427 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Deluge Web-UI is vulnerable to XSS through a crafted torrent file. Thethe data from torrent files is not properly sanitised as it's interpreteddirectly as HTML. Someone who supplies the user with a malicious torrentfile can execute arbitrary Javascript code in the context of the user'sbrowser session.

criterions.comment: deluge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
